page.title: 01 THE STRATFORD AREA
page.content: This area covers the SW outskirts of Stratford and,further out,the villages of Clifford Chambers to the SE and Luddington to the SW,which are separated by the River Avon. Visitors are attracted by Anne Hathaway's cottage in Shottery and the Steeplechase Course-a race course and camp site. There is a Horticultural Research Station at Luddington and a number of small farms. The population is concentrated in the NE where there are several attractive housing estates,schools and a few small shops.Old Town,a Victorian development of terraced houses begins to the east of the Evesham Road,the main road serving the area and many Bed and Breakfast establishments are to be found here. Traffic congestion is bad on Market Fridays and during summer months.
